message: This is about the Federal Government illegally seizing land. If you layman cannot see the significance of their protest, I'll spell it out. This is about the little guy standing up to the big guy. I commend them for their bravery and any positive changes that may occur. I know these Bundy guys aren't popular with the Liberals because heaven forbid they used the 2nd amendment to help protect their 1st.
What a great guy! Keep fighting young lady!

The rich getting richer and the poor getting poorer. Yes thanks OBAMA.

Funny.... Donald J. Trump is a Republican, and he doesn't seem to be having trouble with the media. Has anyone noticed that Ted Cruz is ALWAYS looking for someone to blame for his own failures? He blames the GOP leaders in the Senate and House. He blames President Obama. He blames the Supreme Court. Now he blames the media. Is it possible that maybe -- just maybe -- Senator Ted Cruz over-promised his voters something he KNEW he could not deliver...just so he could get elected?
